short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Genshin Impact on Geforce now on Linux/Steam Deck

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension uses the declarativeNetRequest API to set the Nv-Device-Os to WINDOWS to bypass the Geforce Now OS checks.

Source code can be found at: https://github.com/tigersoldier/gfn-os-switcher
